name: Total War: Rome II - Hannibal at the Gates
name_original: Total War: Rome II - Hannibal at the Gates
description:
Total War: Rome II - Hannibal at the Gates is a strategy game developed by Creative Assembly. It was originally released in 2014. It was published by SEGA. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Total War: Rome II - Hannibal at the Gates is available on PC.
